actions.message:
```
version 4.9.5
Prefix is `&`
help                      Lists available commands
kick [@user] [reason]     Kicks the mentioned user
ban [@user] [reason]      Bans the mentioned user
mute [@user]              Mutes the mentioned user
unmute [@user]            Unmutes the mentioned user
deleteChannel [#channel]  Deletes the mentioned channel
deleteRole [#channel]     Deletes the mentioned role
castspell                 Surprise, surprise!
evradarchives             Invite link to the Archives of Evrad server
disclaimer                A dsiclaimer regarding my liabilities
history                   My history as per Conradin's recollection
mine                      Mine for Diamonds
diamonds                  Check the number of diamonds in your inventory
buy-item                  Spend your diamonds
8ball                     Ask the 8ball a question
```
Support server link is https://discord.gg/7xGZQ3m
To invite me to your Evradian server, use this link https://discordapp.com/oauth2/authorize?client_id=469572238702673920&scope=bot&permissions=2146958591

Here is the invite link to the Archives of Evrad! Beware, when you go in, you will not come out the same!
https://discord.gg/cmEkdvv
actions.name: Send Message

actions.message: OMG did you actually say that? That bloody plague killed most of my friends. Let us hope it never gets released on the world again. :cry:
actions.name: Send Message

actions.message: I am Caiman, the greatest wizard of my age, reader of minds, defender of the free world of Evrad against the greatest perils, including but not limited to : evil gods seeking world destruction or domination, deranged and crazed necromancers serving those gods taking over the world, plagues, demons, dragons, idiots with the power to shape history. I am also the master of potted plant creation (by accident). If you want to know my full story, please use the `&history` command.
actions.name: Send Message

actions.message: I, Caiman of Evrad, take no responsibility for any consequences of my vict-I mean volunteers-being turned into potted plants, or drinking any of my exquisitely fashioned potions that may result in death, becoming a potted plant, turning into a sheep, shrinking, the opposite of what I told you (or exactly what I said), or any number of other uncomfortable (or comfortable) things that may or may not make you late for dinner :wink:
actions.name: Send Message

actions.message:
**The History of Caiman, as told by Conradin**
Caiman is a demi-reddelmar from the great Skyland of Kỳkklópás. He was created by Miilroevan the Reddelmar of good magic, to stop Chorlarus from taking control of Evrad. Over seven and a half thousand years ago, Caiman left the refuge of the Skyland for Evrad. He has a task that he does not reveal to anyone, given to him by Miilroevan. Caiman has roamed the world for his entire life in Evrad, occasionally returning to his adopted home of Springhaven. In Springhaven, he gained knowledge and wisdom from Gerkhin the Summoner and Conradin. Since Gerkhin’s fall, Caiman has become the archrival of Hèlmórí the Black. The wizard has explored virtually every corner of the world, and is able to recall the locations in which he has been without fault. Caiman has an uncanny ability to read the minds of sentient beings, which he has often used to his advantage. For three hundred years, he made his abode in Highcrest, the capital city of Adanác. In his time there, he learned much lore, and shared much wisdom with the noble house of that kingdom. Since then, Caiman has taken up wandering again, often joining companies on adventures that further his purpose. The most famous of these adventures was the journey with Ayun son of Sentr, Gilvyre daughter of Tharmios and their company to defeat the resurgence of demons created by Hèlmórí. Known for playing tricks on unsuspecting people in good fun, and for appearing and disappearing as he pleases.
actions.name: Send Message

actions.message: How dare you worship the Ancient Winged, or see fit to name him! He is nameless, and soon you shall be as well unless you can atone, you miserable rat! I will have your head on my desk...
actions.name: Send Message

actions.message: ...in the form of a potted plant
actions.name: Send Message

actions.message: Stop laughing, you bloody coward. This is no laughing matter. Now laugh your head off next time to rid us of your stupidity!
actions.name: Send Message

actions.message: No matter what you say about their non-interventionist agenda, they do a darn good job of screwing it all up when they do intervene. Oh, and they created me, so I have to agree with them :joy: :wink:
actions.name: Send Message

actions.message:
**Welcome to the setup wizard for giveaways!**
I'll ask you a few choices and then the giveaway will be created!

**Once a giveaway is made, it can not be stopped early!**
actions.name: Send Message

actions.message:
Giveaway Help Setup!

Please list the info below (**In order**)
Title 
Number of Winners - **Number Only - 5 max**
Giveaway Time - **In minutes**
Channel - Where to send the giveaway to? use a #channel
Description - **Enter in the Description of the giveaway.**

Example:
&giveaway create ExampleTitle 2 60 #giveaways Want to win an example text? Enter in today!
actions.name: Send Message

actions.message: A murderer of children he was, even when after he swore never to hurt a child again. What a scumbag. At least he didn't leave his family for dead, though, right?
actions.name: Send Message

actions.message: Wow, he never learned not to trust a random potion given to him even after one nearly started a war. Goblinoid level intelligence he possesses, that is for sure :facepalm:
actions.name: Send Message

actions.message: I have never seen someone who is in service to the Ancent Winged be able to overcome it like he could. A real fighter, despite the fact that he was a hairy, stinky goblinoid.
actions.name: Send Message

actions.message: I wish all goblinoids could be so civilized (for a monster)
actions.name: Send Message

actions.message: If all bugbears could treat others like he did, even when people were threatening him for something he did in the past, the world would be a much better place. Though you would have to leave out the first half of his life, of course.
actions.name: Send Message

actions.message: How dare you slaughter whole villages for your disgraceful king. Get the heck out of here, swine!
actions.name: Send Message

actions.message: I have no time for one who turns on his party, possessed or no!
actions.name: Send Message

actions.message: For all her faults, she always is there to save her friends in need. Except that time that she abandoned her post and let the demons take Iranon Nelvron.
actions.name: Send Message

actions.message: The stubborness is strong with this one
actions.name: Send Message

actions.message: Well she survived the longest in her current form of any of her friends. Does that say something about her ability to survive or her inability to keep them alive as the cleric? Probably the former. Little adverturing scrubs.
actions.name: Send Message

actions.message: Zano never learned the basics of dungeoneering: NEVER PICK UP A FREAKING SWORD IN A DUNGEON. Complete scrub.
actions.name: Send Message

actions.message: When you trust Lelkrit to give you power, it will always come back to bite you in some fatal way, celestial scum. Keep that in mid, all you young adventurers, though I doubt you will ever have the chance to do better
actions.name: Send Message

actions.message: Her husband killed his second wife when he heard that Zano lived. He treated his children like piles of turds. And she still ressurected him??
actions.name: Send Message

actions.message: Everythng for the common people! Oh wait, I let them die. And I never interact with them. For the common folk!!
actions.name: Send Message

actions.message: He saved his friends by jumping as high as he could and bringing the cieling down upon their heads. What kind of maniac thinks that is saving??
actions.name: Send Message

actions.message: He no talk good like me and you, but man he could jump
actions.name: Send Message

actions.message: One track mind. Barbarians. Why do they even exist? Oh right they keep the North safe from abominations.
actions.name: Send Message

actions.message: Aukan would make a great addition to the team, provided you have the brains. He has the brawn, and the Giant fluency, unlike a certain dragon :wink:
actions.name: Send Message

actions.message: Well, I never knew that one could have a brother so freaking strong and dumb, and share both of those traits, but to a lesser extent
actions.name: Send Message

actions.message: His death was quite embarrassing, he let himself be decapitated. What a dummy.
actions.name: Send Message

actions.message: Never give one person the Vorpal sword and invisibility cloak. But, at least he didn't have the ring of jumping at his death, the world would be totally screwed.
actions.name: Send Message

actions.message: He trusted me way too much. He paid the price of being an idiot by almost starting a second giant war. Idiot.
actions.name: Send Message

actions.message: Screw you Mal-i mean Mordk-ai!
actions.name: Send Message

actions.message: He may have known nothing about Giants, but he wasn't a complete a-hole.
actions.name: Send Message

actions.message: He slaughtered over a hundred people by turning into his true form after I tossed him in potted plant form into the air in a library. Bugger.
actions.name: Send Message

actions.message: He left his family for dead. They suffered way worse. Try living with that and being a hero
actions.name: Send Message

actions.message: He let demons take over the dwarven kingdom beneath his lair. Terrible furnace with wings. Minus the furnace part. Ok, you get it. Dragon.
actions.name: Send Message

actions.message: He would have been a great friend, if he could have just stopped lying to ***every freaking person***!!!!
actions.name: Send Message

actions.message: Who tf are you talking about, you blasted imbecile?
actions.name: Send Message

actions.message: I don't speak so good, says Mishann. But I possess knowledge that is beyond your reckoning. But what good does that do if you don't share it, eh?
actions.name: Send Message

actions.message: Heal the orb! What a stupid idea. Way outside the box. But by Miilroevan, it worked!
actions.name: Send Message

actions.message: He may have known nothing about Giants, but he wasn't a complete a-hole.
actions.name: Send Message

actions.message: He slaughtered over a hundred people by turning into his true form after I tossed him in potted plant form into the air in a library. Bugger.

actions.message: He left his family for dead. They suffered way worse. Try living with that and being a hero

actions.message: He let demons take over the dwarven kingdom beneath his lair. Terrible furnace with wings. Minus the furnace part. Ok, you get it. Dragon.
